title: High-risk day trading is all the rage in the military, but experts say soldiers could be sabotaging retirement plans
full_text: High-risk day trading is all the rage in the military, but experts say soldiers could be sabotaging retirement plans. Some service members are learning the hard way that adrenaline-fueled investing can jeopardize long-term wealth.. For some service members, the action theyre seeing isnt on the battlefield its in the markets. While some are making big money through high-risk stock trading and other short-term, risky investments,… [+5558 chars]
